subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: The defending champion Adam Scott withdrew from the Houston Open because of fever and swollen glands. Scott shared the first-round lead with Johnson Wagner after they shot course-record 63s Thursday. But Scott, who has been ailing all week, shot a 76 Friday.
